summary: This is a simple mod that adds a Dunmer by the name of Taylor to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Yes, I know Dunmer cannot go to Sovngarde, but this mod is not aimed at lore-friendliness. It was made to remember Taylor, an avid player of Skyrim and brother to the OP over here:Â http://www.reddit.com/r/gaming/comments/2ydbih/my_brother_passed_away_in_2013_i_still_visit_him/
<br />
<br />To the best of my ability I tried to recreate his likeness and hope that I have succeeded.
<br />
<br />You can find Taylor in Sovngarde, wandering the mead halls among the heroes of legend.
author: Epichp
